attributes.action: Allow driving tests to be taken during Tier 4/national lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: I sincerely hope that this issue can be resolved as it will not only help resolve the backlog but will also make young people avoid disappointment.
attributes.background: Due to the massive backlog that has already been created from the 2 other lockdowns, I believe driving test centres should stay open to allow the backlog to be resolved. I also believe that if Taxis are aloud to carry on business why can’t driving Instructors/invigilators also be aloud to carry on?

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
